mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_TYPE, IN_STORE_COUNT, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_STATUS, DISCOUNT_RATE, (SELECT ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_IMG_ORDER=0 AND ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO) THUMBNAIL FROM "ITEM" A WHERE ITEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY "ITEM_NO"

SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_STATUS, DISCOUNT_RATE, ITEM_IMG_NO, (ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME) THUMBNAIL, ITEM_IMG_ORDER FROM "ITEM" JOIN "ITEM_IMG" USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE ITEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY "ITEM_NO" DESC

SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_STATUS, DISCOUNT_RATE, (SELECT ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME FROM ITEM_IMG C WHERE C.ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO ) THUMBNAIL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENTAL_PAYMENT_ITEM B WHERE B.ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO ) ORDER_COUNT FROM "ITEM" A WHERE ITEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ORDER_COUNT DESC

SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_STATUS, DISCOUNT_RATE, ITEM_IMG_NO, (ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME) THUMBNAIL, ITEM_IMG_ORDER FROM "ITEM" JOIN "ITEM_IMG" USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE ITEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY "ITEM_PRICE" ASC

SELECT SEQ_ITEM_NUM.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO "ITEM" VALUES( #{itemNo}, #{itemType}, #{inStoreCount}, DEFAULT, #{itemPrice}, #{itemName}, #{itemDescription}, DEFAULT, #{discountRate} )
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_TYPE, IN_STORE_COUNT, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_STATUS, DISCOUNT_RATE, (SELECT ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_IMG_ORDER=0 AND ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO) THUMBNAIL, (SELECT ITEM_IMG_PATH || ITEM_IMG_RENAME FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_IMG_ORDER=1 AND ITEM_NO = A.ITEM_NO) ITEM_DETAIL_IMG FROM "ITEM" A WHERE ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE "ITEM" SET ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType}, IN_STORE_COUNT = #{inStoreCount}, ITEM_PRICE = #{itemPrice}, ITEM_NAME = #{itemName}, ITEM_DESCRIPTION = #{itemDescription}, DISCOUNT_RATE = #{discountRate} WHERE ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}
